comments.author: crashblue81
comments.body: Just to keep in mind on average there are 350 people with a permit applying for each München Modell apartment that is vacant.

comments.author: Altruistic-Local9329
comments.body: Pretty sure you have to re-register for sowon six Months before your current registration ends. Otherwise, you will be locked ist of the system for months.

comments.author: fhandschuch
comments.body: I don‘t know how immowelt works, but on Immobilienscout24 you can check the „Wohnberechtigungsschein erforderlich“ option in the additional filters. Münchner Wohnen (formerly GEWOFAG and GWG) used that option for the München Modell apartments in their portfolio. I had a scraper with that filter running when I was looking with my family - although we never got one, got something else from GEWOFAG at the time.

comments.author: tofudoener
comments.body: Where's that number from? Is it the same for families with kids? Just asking because literally all families I know that searched for one (did sometimes take a few years, of course), eventually got into a Genossenschaft/München Modell.

comments.author: crashblue81
comments.body: That was on average from a SZ article I read.
